website_summaries.verdict: A solid stainless steel workhorse with 3 professional grade needles. Those who plan on marinating heavy meats such as turkey, brisket, or pork shoulder will benefit from its strength.
pros: Very easy to disassemble and clean
Sharp needles penetrate meat easily, and larger holes will inject minced garlic
cons: Barrel can be difficult to fill

customer_reviews.title: Warranty and Ebook no longer exist
customer_reviews.text: Ok...so I haven’t used this yet, and I’m considering the return. It appears that the company wasnt able to gain enough funding. So they closed up shop. There is no warranty or link to promised EBook...basically this unit looks identical to the other 20 billion on amazon....most for half the price. I liked the videos the creator had done, he seemed like a good guy. Just disappointed for him. And sad that Amazon keeps peddling incorrect information about a company that went under 7 months ago....I hope someone is going to read this and tell me I’m wrong...preferably before I return....but sadly, I think Dave’s last video sumed it up!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Grace

customer_reviews.title: My bad.
customer_reviews.text: Certainly a professional quality tool. Very well built & capable of injecting just about anything. This is not a criticism, but you do have to be very careful with the 2 smaller injection needles, as anything (like pepper, etc.) in the sauce you're injecting will clog the openings. Not so with the larger needle (3rd one). The kit does not come with anything to clean the smaller needles, so you have to improvise (if one gets clogged). I found a large paper clip, straightened, of course, managed to work, but it took some time and effort. Yes, would definately buy again, now that I learned the hard way about the smaller injection needles. My bad.
customer_reviews.author: w ripley

customer_reviews.title: Its built like a small precision medical or military instrument
customer_reviews.text: I have had 3 meat injectors before this one . This one is really worth the moderate extra amount ($ 10.00 -$15,00 ) more than the typical plastic injectors . Its built like a small precision medical or military instrument. Stainless steel , O-rings . WILL NOT LEAK at any connection. Unlike the others I have used that leaked around the needle threads. The needle with the multiple perforations works great for non sediment (only liquid ) marinades. Bought it off Amazon. Grill Beast has contacted me several times in E mails with recipes and offering support -should I need it . Great Product and Very good customer service .
customer_reviews.author: J.Piesak

customer_reviews.title: "MONSTER" Injector...  it IS a BEAST!
customer_reviews.text: Injector delivered before stated delivery date. And, despite having been made in China, the thing was/is a piece of quality workmanship. Surface finishes clean and complete; no ragged, half-formed finish on any surface; knurling is complete on injector "needles." Cap and 'needle' screw threads properly machined and finished. Unusual from a piece that normally would have been fabbed of 'chinesium.' Oddly enough, this is fabbed from actual stainless steel. Quite surprised! Goes to show China CAN produce quality work when they want to. Came w/ suggested marinade recipes. When next the grill is fired up for the appropriate meat, this 'BEAST' will be put to use. I doubt it will fail. Thus, a recommended, excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Nate93

customer_reviews.title: Grill Beast
customer_reviews.text: I have owned other injectors in the past which were dismal in comparison to the grill beast. Do yourself a favor and read all of the directions before you use it. If you wash it as they suggest, there will be no sticking of O-rings. I wash it immediately after using it, dry it, and apply vegetable oil on threads and O-rings. I was unaware when I ordered this, how nice the storage box would be. I received a few emails after my purchase to make certain I was completely happy with the product. You need the Grill Beast if you smoke pork shoulder or braise chuck roast.
customer_reviews.author: dan

customer_reviews.title: Highest rated product on Amazon and worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I was a little suspicious of the ratings when I read them. I completely understood the ratings after receicing the injector. This injector was designed by someone who was out to proove a point. The barrel is reminicent of a hydraulic ram you might find on an excavaror only smaller. The fit and finish is superb. The spare o-ring seals were a welcomed surprise. I can forsee no normal use of this item that could cause it to malfunction. It would be amazing if other manufacturers followed suit.
customer_reviews.author: Gerard M.

customer_reviews.title: OOOOOHHHHH How I Love My Beast Injector!!!
customer_reviews.text: OOOOOHHHHHH how I love my Beast Injector, this is perfect works most awesomely and I am soooo glad I read the reviews, because I made a very wise purchase. I use my Beast Injector with my Flavorize book packed full of recipes and they work like 2 peas in a pod. I wouldn't be without either and I would highly recommend purchasing this Injector you wont be sorry you did. This product is very well made/is of high quality. I would definitely order this product again. I would order from this company again. Thanks 4 making such a great product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nature girl in Texas

customer_reviews.title: No Ebook!
customer_reviews.text: Where is this “ebook”? There was an insert in the box, which included NO email address, NO website address, or any other instns for obtaining the ebook. I found a youtube video by the CEO saying that info is on the insert, along with a “passcode”, but that’s bogus. No such info anywhere on the insert OR the box. Just says Made in China... Can’t find website via google either. Update: Question concerning ebook not answered. BUYER BEWARE! This product no longer supported.
customer_reviews.author: aprimeclient

customer_reviews.title: Perhaps my highest compliment is reaffirming what others have raved ...
customer_reviews.text: Perhaps my highest compliment is reaffirming what others have raved about. I opened this item in front of a friend, as we were about to use it with BBQ'ing. His response was they eye popping, jaw dropping , "WHOA!" We both KNEW that this item far exceeded anything that we had seen in the stores. We are talking Rolls Royce quality, and give this item my biggest recommendation. From the second this item is in your hand, you silly know that your expectations are surpassed. Thank you to this company, and wish that more items of this quality were readily available with the many that we seek.
customer_reviews.author: Legardi11Top Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: the metal ones (that look like they were used to bleed people in the 1700's) ...
customer_reviews.text: I've used a number of injectors in my day. In my experience, the metal ones (that look like they were used to bleed people in the 1700's) are of poor quality, leak, and rust easily. Not this guy. I've used it for at least six briskets and twelve shoulders. Fantastic product (only change I would add would be to offer a smaller needle with multiple holes- it would come in handy injecting poultry, etc).
customer_reviews.author: Lefty Black

customer_reviews.title: This is a quality-built and sturdy tool for the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality-built and sturdy tool for the kitchen. It will take me a number of uses to get the injection technique to be successful. This is a very artsy procedure and requires patience during the learning phase, including cleaning up a lot of spilled oil, . My first try was injecting truffle oil in a roaster chicken, whose meat readily clogs the needle. I wasted a lot of the precious oil, so I suggest learning with a less-expensive marinade. In spite of myself, the chicken was delicious and encourages me to try again. Suggestion to seller, provide a simple demo video showing exactly how to inject.
customer_reviews.author: WilliamB

customer_reviews.title: The Last One I Buy
customer_reviews.text: This injector is as described. It is a BEAST! It holds a large volume. It is easy to clean. The handle design is sturdy. I have owned multiple injectors over the years, I'm quite sure this is the last I will ever have to buy. It even comes with extra gaskets. And the box is built for storage of the components, which is also well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Ledermann

customer_reviews.title: Amazing meat injector
customer_reviews.text: I can honestly say this is a great meat injector. Wash it up throughly before use with some soap and water. I recommend putting a little cooking oil into the body before inserting the plunger. It will make injection so much easier. The included tips are great. I've been using this injector for over a year to inject mostly boston butts and it's been wonderful. I use the angle needle most of the time. I find the 12 hole needle too messy. I've injected well over 50 butts with this injector. I definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: High Tech Redneck

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I have bought MANY different kinds, brands, styles of injectors, but none of them seemed to quite be up to the job I required of them. This purchase was a last effort to find an injector that would work on a heavy/chunkier marinade without breaking or making a mess. This injector DEFINATELY fits the bill!! To say it does a good job would be an understatement. It does everything they say it will and is built to last. The company was emailing me almost immediately with thanks, suggestions, and recipes. It is nice to know that there are still company's out there that actually care about their clients and their products!!!
customer_reviews.author: bruno

customer_reviews.title: Works better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Now I understand why all those BBQ competition guys inject. I finally let my son talk me into trying injecting pork butts (I never have injected anything), and this injector is both pretty beefy and relatively inexpensive. Wow, what a difference. I just made what was by far the juiciest, tastiest, tenderest pork butt I have ever cooked. I am going to get a lot of use out of this injector - which worked great, by the way.
customer_reviews.author: OldGuyToo

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have for Any Meat Lovers!
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have for all smokers and meat lovers! We made the mistake of always buying cheap injectors however this is worth every penny. The injector itself is super heavy duty, it offers different sizes (which is great for different recipes) & holds a fairly good amount! Also it is super easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: awarnke

customer_reviews.title: Hubby luvs it!
customer_reviews.text: Baby bought it for her daddy for Christmas because he's a really great daddy who loves to cook and bake, grill and smoke ... he absolutely luvs this thing! He no longer worries about the injector needle breaking off. Daddy is a big stud at 6'3" and his fingers easily fit in the grip.
customer_reviews.author: Dean and Yvonne

customer_reviews.title: Built extremely strong!
customer_reviews.text: This feels extremely strong and sturdy which is a MUST. Bought this for my father-in-law because each year he does a pig roast and every year at least one needle breaks on him. Got this in hopes of being able to stop that tradition lol
customer_reviews.author: Michele M.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 specifically for the end of the year party my buddies and I hold every year for the past 15 years. We slow cook a whole pig (usually 165lbs+) over 10 hours, and this will replace our old vet seringes. Built quality is outstanding, shipping was super fast, customer service is great, they follow up, send you recipes amongst others. I’m sure they will accompany us for many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Javier B.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in a pinch as I was getting ready for a bbq competition and could not find my old trusty. When I got this it looked like something from American Horror Story. It comes with a few different tip so you can do whatever you need to do. I have used this on many briskets, tritips, and pork shoulders now and this will remain my competition injection kit.
customer_reviews.author: TJ Brown

customer_reviews.title: Must have for any turkey.
customer_reviews.text: Updating my review to 5 stars. This has been my go to injector when cooking turkey for the last 3 yeats! Caution cylinder will get hot if used with hot fluids.
customer_reviews.author: J. Craw

customer_reviews.title: well written and do a good job of educating the uninitiated on the techniques (and ...
customer_reviews.text: We were really impressed with the quality of this injector - the other reviews that comment on this are the real deal. One piece of advice: if you are planning on buying this, you should be prepared to take the time to read the internet instructions posted by the seller. They are thorough, well written and do a good job of educating the uninitiated on the techniques (and science) of effectively using the injector.
customer_reviews.author: joe a

customer_reviews.title: Great Injection System!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to fulfill one of the steps in a pulled pork recipe and have always been a gadget guy. The Grill Beast was highly rated and appeared well engineered. I was not disappointed. The seals should never need replacing, being made of a very durable nylon-type material, but just in case, they send along an extra set. Everything fits together well, the action is very smooth and it was fun to plug in the various needles to see what works best. Pick one up, you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Gann

customer_reviews.title: Great BBQ Tool
customer_reviews.text: This injector is made of heavy duty stainless steel and it looks like it will last for a long time. I was using a plastic injector that came with some marinade I bought and this stainless steel injector is much better in every way. The holes in this injectors needle are also larger than the free injectors needle so they don't get clogged as easily. It works really well and I have not had any problems with the injector so far. I highly recommend this to anyone who wants to make better tasting and more moist Bar B Que.
customer_reviews.author: Talltexan

customer_reviews.title: Brisket was off the charts juicy
customer_reviews.text: A must for Smokers and home chefs. Way better quality than I expected. Make your own oil and organic stocks and leave butter ball turkeys to the masses.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Great construction of the unit and strong pressure and 3 ...
customer_reviews.text: It got here a few days before Thanksgiving. I used it on my turkey. I have been wanting one of these for a while and it met all my expectations and more. Unless it suddenly explodes in my hands this will be a regularly used item for all my BBQs. Great construction of the unit and strong pressure and 3 tips for varied applications.
customer_reviews.author: JV

customer_reviews.title: The best injector for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I had purchase injectors before purchasing the Grill Beast and the Grille Beast is a superior injector and well made and does everything like they claim it does. I like the fact that I no longer have to strain my marinades as the Grill Beast has a injector just for the purpose of injecting the small herbs in marinades. This is an awesome injector and you won't be disappointed purchasing a Grill Beast.
customer_reviews.author: mycats3344

customer_reviews.title: What a Beast indeed
customer_reviews.text: This was even more heavy duty than expected. The quality and weight are so very impressive. Looking forward to firing up the smoker soon. I even took it to work to show off how awesome this thing is!
customer_reviews.author: Betsy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: So far AMAZING PRODUCT, I at first purchased the Traeger version and that one was over priced and not made very well. However this injector kit has everything and built very very well! I absolutely love how it comes with the extra needles!
customer_reviews.author: sara r.

customer_reviews.title: I can't say enough good things about this unit
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough good things about this unit....pure class!! When my Smoker/BBQ pals come over, I let them do the injecting, and they are embarrassed to admit they have the plastic variety of an injector at home. The company that sells this product is top notch also! I have communicated with them a couple of times and have had great results ordering spare O-rings, etc! Get one of these injector sets....they are GREAT!!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Not at all what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: I did not receive a Grill Beast 304 Stainless Steel Meat Injector as it is shown on Amazon. The item has a Chinese word printed on the side of it and that's it. There are absolutely no instructions on how to use it. I was going to give someone the injector as a gift. I am too embarrassed to give it to him because it looks looks like a cheap piece of Made in China junk.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Krupsky

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievably solid construction - exceeded my high expectations.
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly solid construction. Thick stainless steel everywhere. They offer a lifetime warranty, and it's hard to imagine ever needing to use the warranty. Really cool product. The three types of injection needles seem to cover most of the uses I'm likely to run into. I'd had two other injection systems, and they truly pale in comparison (really!) Great stuff!
customer_reviews.author: AlanR

customer_reviews.title: A must have in your BBQ-Smoker arsenal
customer_reviews.text: I bought this back in 2014 to use for smoked pork shoulder. Every time we use this, our smoked pork comes out juicy and full of flavor. Haven't tried on other meats yet. Disappointed though to see that it is discontinued as I was hoping to buy another one as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: HCDavis

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding product
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered one of these 2 years ago. Not sure what happened to the original one. But it was possibly lost when I moved. This product performs as it should. The injector and needles are heavy duty and well made. And these guys deliver their product quickly, on time and even before the delivery date stated that's why I ordered this product from them again. KEEP THE GOOD WORK gents!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: DVILDOG77

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Injector
customer_reviews.text: Got tired of replacing broken plastic injectors. Used this on Turkey Day to inject our smoked, 15# bird. Worked great. If you want to use herbs like thyme or rosemary you need to use the powdered stuff or make your own. The holes in the needles are not large enough to accommodate larger pieces. Great craftsmanship and easy to clean. Great assortment of needles. This injector will see a lot of use come bbq season.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy injector at an affordable cost
customer_reviews.text: I love how easy it is to clean, maintain and use! All at a affordable price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: infused
customer_reviews.text: used to infuse a whole chicken with a mixture of ground onion, mango, brown sugar and spices. Worked very well. Should have instructions.
customer_reviews.author: H B

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be happier with the quality and convenience
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Couldn't be happier with the quality and convenience. Very well put together, sturdy, and easy to take apart and clean. Used for a pig roast and the variety of needle sizes worked wonderfully for thick injectables like butter, garlic, and onion mix down to apple juice and cider. Also the box it came in made me feel like I was unboxing a Rolex. Fitted foam inserts and nice packaging. Stores perfect in a drawer
customer_reviews.author: Andrew A.

customer_reviews.title: Finally got around to using this and the quality is excellent.
customer_reviews.text: Quality throughout. You won't be disappointed. Easy to use and easy to clean. Comes with extra o-rings. Would buy again if I needed one. Chances are this will last longer than me.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa J

customer_reviews.title: It's not just a clever name. It is a BEAST!!!!!  Buy it you'll love it!
customer_reviews.text: I've had dozens of plastic injectors and all of them have broken. I'm sure I've spent more money on those than i did on the one I feel will outlast me. Other than that there's not much to say that hasn't been saids 100's of times already. This thing is as it's name indicates, A FREAKIN' BEAST! It's huge it's heavy and it's awesome! Follow the directions oil up the o rings and you will be so happy for a long long time. I've not sourced new O rings but assume any could/should work.
customer_reviews.author: Mota

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty!
customer_reviews.text: Best injector I have ever had! It’s a BEAST! Love that it has different needles, especially the large needle is big enough for my garlic chicken marinade. 5/5 Stars would recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Connor I.

customer_reviews.title: Ok, not exactly as pictured!
customer_reviews.text: Mine only came with two needles, not the three that were pictured! It looks to be a good quality & should work well, just a bit disappointed with not getting everything as described. *Revised my review to 5 stars! - Grill Beast contacted me & shipped out replacement needles along with extra seals. They truly stand behind their product and have wonderful customer service. Buy with confidence!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gailyn A. Bassler

customer_reviews.title: Its a little tough to press the plunger but that ...
customer_reviews.text: Its a little tough to press the plunger but that also means there is no leakage of fluid out the back of the plunger. It all goes into the meat
customer_reviews.author: Shawn W

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly well made and surprisingly positive results
customer_reviews.text: Solidly made product, but they were wise enough to include spare O-rings (which are bound to deteriorate over time). But being well made is not enough. The Grill Beast substantially improves grilling meats: I've done a brisket and pork shoulder and I am absolutely convinced that the mixtures I injected both tenderized the meat as well as keeping it moist.
customer_reviews.author: OphirDude

customer_reviews.title: Best injector I have ever seen
customer_reviews.text: Best injector I have ever seen! Used it for deep fried turkey at Thanksgiving and Christmas. Make your turkey nice and moist and provides for a taste of your own. Guests raved about the great turkey! I'm just sorry I didn't get one sooner. So much better than the ones sold in the grocery store. The quality is better than any I've ever used!!
customer_reviews.author: dj garner

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice, heavy tool for injecting marinades into meat
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice, heavy tool for injecting marinades into meat. The injectors I had used previously were too fine , and just ended up clogging more than injecting. This was a gift for my grill-master husband. He hasn't used it yet, but agreed that it should do a great job.
customer_reviews.author: WendyB

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: I just received this my first injector. Looks solid, sturdy and well elaborated. Comes with 1 set of spare O rings. I'm very happy. The guys from Grill Beast have a customer service that keep communication with me and have been very kind. They also send me a free online book of recipies. As soon as I use this great injector I'll update this review.
customer_reviews.author: JCDarquea

customer_reviews.title: Great Product - But Brace Yourself for Relentless Requests for a Review.
customer_reviews.text: Great, quality product. Comes with a link to a downloadable eBook with recipes. I've only used it a few times, but operation and cleanup were a breeze. I docked a star to warn others that upon purchase, and after, expect a handful of emails - and then somehow even an evening phone call basically strong-arming me for a review. This tacky practice is unfortunately becoming more commonplace with items I purchase from Amazon, but these guys were the first to actually call me. I hope that trend is discontinued.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Payne

customer_reviews.title: The injector arrived promptly; cleaned and used it same day.  Worked as described
customer_reviews.text: The injector arrived promptly; cleaned and used it same day. Worked as described. It worked perfectly. It is sturdy, but in using the injector it is important to use it correctly and with care. The shipper sent a follow up e-mail reminding about the free ebook, and a list of helpful suggestions along with support contact numbers. Great product... Great service
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: First class product and support.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this meat injector. It wasn't working the way it should. I got an email asking me if all was ok with it. So I responded. Twenty minutes later, my phone rings. It was the seller. I don't know how he got my number. He was very concerned and told me what was wrong. Amazing. I did what he said and it worked great. He provides recipes and how to's also.
customer_reviews.author: STEVE KENNEDY

customer_reviews.title: We have made a whole chicken on a can on the grill several times and it turns out perfect every time
customer_reviews.text: This meat injector makes the moistest chicken that I have ever had the pleasure of eating. It really is impressive. I wish we had bought it a long time ago. We have made a whole chicken on a can on the grill several times and it turns out perfect every time. The meat injector arrived quickly and was well packaged. It is easy to use and clean. Excellent product and excellent company.
customer_reviews.author: Shadowchaser

customer_reviews.title: Injectings best...
customer_reviews.text: This has been a long time coming. After using weak, cheap injector needles for many years, I decided to give this Grill Beast a try. This tool did not disappoint. If you are injecting meat for smoking or grilling, this device can save time and a mess - it is probably indestructible, as long as it is cleaned and stored properly.
customer_reviews.author: B. Clarke

customer_reviews.title: I have used all the needles and they all work perfect for their intended purpose
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a beast! I don't think with proper care there will ever be a need to replace it. I have used all the needles and they all work perfect for their intended purpose. I use this almost every time I am smoking some meat.
customer_reviews.author: Chris B.

customer_reviews.title: I injected melted butter with garlic power mixed in and I was amazed how moist this bird everyone raved about it
customer_reviews.text: We had a 27lb frozen turkey for Christmas that was thawed out in our refrigerator. I injected melted butter with garlic power mixed in and I was amazed how moist this bird everyone raved about it. I would recommend this high quality tool is. I've never had a better turkey then this one and I know the Grill Beast was the difference.
customer_reviews.author: george moyer

customer_reviews.title: Good Beast... good
customer_reviews.text: This is a serious setup. May not be as fast as a machine injector, but, the procession more then makes up for it. Also, you get a couple different needle ends so you can do 1 injection, or multi injections at once. Also noted and appreciated the big hole... allows for some greater particulate to go through without clogging injector.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very useful BBQ tool.
customer_reviews.text: Works well sturdy. Handles lots of fluids if differing thickness. Nice that it comes with extra o-ring.
customer_reviews.author: GoDawgs

customer_reviews.title: Nice product. Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Great customer service. They even called me and asked if I had any questions, problems and to make sure I got the free e-book. The e-book was quite helpful to get started with marinade recipes and tips to create your own recipes. I also used it for injecting jello (While still liquid) into cake balls. By the way, it also came with an extra set of o-rings as I am sure that over time, they will wear out.
customer_reviews.author: Jimbo

customer_reviews.title: Did not come with the right needles.
customer_reviews.text: It looks like a good product. Comes with extra seals and packed in high density foam. However mine did not come with the proper needles. One is slightly bent (not a huge issue) but it does not come with the two separate large needles. Instead both of my large needles are three holed. No needle for chunky marinade. Pretty disappointed. I would like to leave a good review but cannot due to an incomplete set. I will try the injectors that came with it but this is a let down. I was really hoping for the "giant horrific doctors needle"
customer_reviews.author: Susan N.

customer_reviews.title: Its incredibly sturdy and durable
customer_reviews.text: This thing is the bomb. All you have to do is remember to use vegetable oil on the gaskets when you finish cleaning it. I've done all kinds of injecting with this thing and wish I had purchased this earlier in my career. It blows any plastic injector off the market. Its incredibly sturdy and durable. Worth every cent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great product.
customer_reviews.text: great product... had one small issue and they replaced everything.... responded to my email inquiry in under two hours... when i sent a second notice advising that they were sending me more then required, they responded again within an hour, saying, this is how we do business! Can not beat this... excellent price surpassed only by their customer service... The injector is a beast. heavy duty. better then i imagined.
customer_reviews.author: Don S.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome,Awesome Product.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome,Awesome buy,For those of us who do competition BBQ this is a must have it will take your meats to a different level. For the average cook/s this is as must have it is very easy to use and it will take your food/meats to a different level, You will not regret this purchase and make sure you get this brand I have others but they don't compete or compare to this one. I hope to be buying another one very soon.
customer_reviews.author: Disable Veteran

customer_reviews.title: Must be good-just received and brother that is constantly grilling ...
customer_reviews.text: Must be good-just received and brother that is constantly grilling bought it off of me .Ordered another for my use .
customer_reviews.author: Frank T.

customer_reviews.title: false add
customer_reviews.text: it clearly states there is an ebook in the discription, yet this book is not available at all.
customer_reviews.author: Warren C.

customer_reviews.title: He emailed me and personally asked how was I liking the injector and sent me another needle that was perfect. I highly recommend for any cook
customer_reviews.text: Finally got to use this baby. The frame of this beast is as advertised, A BEAST! you can feel the weight of the needles in the casing. I did receive one that was bent but the customer service of this guy is exemplary! He emailed me and personally asked how was I liking the injector and sent me another needle that was perfect. I highly recommend for any cook.
customer_reviews.author: jelani

customer_reviews.title: Changed my opinion
customer_reviews.text: originally i gave this product a one star because I received an open product. On reflection, that only reflected amazon's poor practices of selling open/used items as new to their public. I am changing my review to reflect the fact that this product is well made, excellent craftsmanship and most importantly, it works great! My family loves the new flavors I am able to introduce to my barbecues.
customer_reviews.author: tata

customer_reviews.title: Release the Beast!
customer_reviews.text: Grill beast for sure! I've owned several less beasty injectors only to be disappointed. This thing is a piece of art, heavy duty art even. First time out of the gate was for some smoked turkey which thanks to the injector came out great. This is worth every penny, will have you wanting to inject everything you cook.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Goudeau

customer_reviews.title: First Class Product and Company!
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded my expectations. Very high quality product. Great follow up from the manufacture and very nice recipe book. Used it to inject a pork shoulder and my friends said it was the best pulled pork they ever ate. Great packaging as well, as the awesome case that came with it, I will use for future storage of the injector and components.
customer_reviews.author: Grangerman

customer_reviews.title: Adequet, but not great
customer_reviews.text: A little clunky, could be easier to maneuver and use. Easy to make a mess, but that's BBQ
customer_reviews.author: Jeff G

customer_reviews.title: The BEST INJECTOR EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: Cant believe how good this product worked, All the years of cheap injectors. Cooked a full pig for family BBQ and couldn't have done it with out this injector. Cant wait for Thanksgiving Im doing Two turkeys this is going to work perfect!!!
customer_reviews.author: Debra Perez

customer_reviews.title: It comes apart quickly for easy cleaning. It comes with extra silicone gaskets
customer_reviews.text: Can't dress this one up: it's a marinade injector. The most important points: it's big. It works. It comes apart quickly for easy cleaning. It comes with extra silicone gaskets. It's nicely designed, looks pretty, and isn't uncomfortable to use. It's not expensive. I haven't had any issues using this product, but the company owner seems very invested in the success of this thing. Between the mailing list and the individual responses to every customer service issue that others here are posting about, this appears to be a guy who really gets customer outreach. Nicely done.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Goldschrafe

customer_reviews.title: It's a great tool to have in your arsenal and you feel ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used this on BBQ and also the Thanksgiving turkey. Just make sure if you use needle with the small holes, that you filter out any small chunks of spices because they will plug it up. It's a great tool to have in your arsenal and you feel like a mad scientist when you are using it.
customer_reviews.author: Grizzly

customer_reviews.title: The Beast
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a BEAST and I LOVE IT. I used this to inject my turkey with the brine while smoking (I boiled the brine prior to injecting to ensure no other contamination as I was injecting this until the last hour). I'm really wanting to try some butter and minced garlic and see how that does through here. Oh how I love food.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew K.

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I gave this product 5 stars becasue i couldn't go higher. I have a few of the plastic injectors and after using the Beast i will never go back. Great customer service, the company has emailed me twice just to make sure everything was going good with the product. If you enjoy injecting meats this product is a must have.
customer_reviews.author: Watch Freak

customer_reviews.title: Taste what you've been missing!
customer_reviews.text: This is the injector for all of your beer can chickens, roasts, and oil-less turkey fryers. It has a good capacity, seals tight, and cleans easily. I love this think. Try 6oz of beer, mixed with some poultry or mesquite seasoning - inject into turkey/chicken/duck/hen breast & thigh meat. Try cinnamon & melted butter in hams. Have fun and enjoy the flavor!
customer_reviews.author: DrStTee

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product.....
customer_reviews.text: I think this is by far the best injector I have ever used or even seen. Sturdy, strong and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Rob B.

customer_reviews.title: HURRY ... Get it all ... Holidays here soon... the guests are doing a zombie walk to your kitchen !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Built like a tank. Very responsive customer cars by the Big Kahouna himself. Spices are great too. Get it all right now before it is too late! Asteroids lurk near Earth orbit. OMG!!! Here comes one now !!!! Quick ! Marinade everything !!!!! Love the product and service.
customer_reviews.author: gooddog

customer_reviews.title: Great for anyone
customer_reviews.text: Solid injector. Clean and lube before first use and after each use. Stainless steel body 2oz and injection tube station. 3 sizes one for liquids with numerous ports, one for herbs and finely chopped or ground spices and a smaller tube for the more delicate food like fish and fowl. You won't be disappointed with this injecter.
customer_reviews.author: Heliflyer

customer_reviews.title: Way better than the cheaper versions...
customer_reviews.text: I got a cheaper one and it was broken out of the box! THIS ONE was 1000 times better because it's made with 100% stainless steel, it has extra rubber gasket rings and that's awesome. Don't go with the cheaper versions. There is no comparison. Invest in this one and you won't have to return anything like I did. I returned the cheapie and got The Beast.
customer_reviews.author: G-FAB

customer_reviews.title: Best I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I never owned a professional grade injector, like this one before. I had a few cheapo ones braking after a couple of use of never even worked, so this one is a real treat for me. What a difference. Woks quickly and effortlessly and cleaning is a breeze since it is made of all surgical grade material. The only better thing than the injector itself is their customer service, and I thank you for that.
customer_reviews.author: Gusztav Rozsa

customer_reviews.title: This is worth every penny. My old one went ...
customer_reviews.text: This is worth every penny. My old one went to the trash after using this! A must buy. I bought their gloves also and this Grill Beast products is worth every penny. I will stay with their products as its all first class! Its just what they say it is. They stand behind their products plus with Amazon cant go wrong!!
customer_reviews.author: Richy

customer_reviews.title: Be prepared to get more flavor
customer_reviews.text: Love it feel like Dr. Jekyll. Lol I can inject so much further into a rack of ribs or any meat for that matter it seems to be sturdy only time will tell
customer_reviews.author: ld

customer_reviews.title: This thing is so well made! It will last forever!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this. It's a beast and works great!
customer_reviews.author: JoJo99

customer_reviews.title: Excellent injector!!
customer_reviews.text: This injector far surpasses my previous two injectors. It is very well built and the operation of it is the best that I've seen. The large reservoir and perforated needle makes the injection process, quick and easy. So far, I am very impressed. And, I received a very handy e-book for marinades, as a bonus for buying the injector. I am definitely impressed with this company. Hope they keep making great products for the serious BBQ'er..
customer_reviews.author: TimInNH

customer_reviews.title: A lot a research done before purchasing
customer_reviews.text: Love this injector! Worked very well in all meat. I made the right choice.
customer_reviews.author: Troy

customer_reviews.title: Worth to have
customer_reviews.text: Nice heavy steel and delivered by DHL on time , no worries 😉
customer_reviews.author: Accurate study

customer_reviews.title: High Quality - Heavy Duty
customer_reviews.text: Top of the line injector. As long as you keep it clean this will last a lifetime. Or at least my remaining time on the planet.
customer_reviews.author: Bill The Bob

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Used the Beast Injector with it’s multi hole needle to inject a big full packer. Turned out juicy and great! During cleanup I lost one of the O-rings. I contacted Grill Beast and they promptly sent several replacements. Great product! Great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony V. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, definetely worth the purchase
customer_reviews.text: This beast is just that, beast! Make sure you follow the instructions for cleaning and storage and this thing will last forever! It takes some getting use to on screwing the lid back on but overall this does an outstanding job of injecting foods
customer_reviews.author: K P

customer_reviews.title: 3 needle sizes helped. It's kind of trial and ...
customer_reviews.text: 3 needle sizes helped. It's kind of trial and error, start with the smallest but if that get's clogged or won't reach you go to the biggest. I haven't found a use for the one with three holes because I haven't yet injected anything with enough liquid to cover them.
customer_reviews.author: jeff zaun

customer_reviews.title: Looking forward to injecting my hot meat in the future.
customer_reviews.text: This syringe is well made and a solid tool. I appreciate the obvious thought that went into it. The gaskets appear to be high quality and built to last, but there is still a spare set included for down the road. I expect this will last me many years of grilling and smoking.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Certainly a better product than you can buy anywhere else
customer_reviews.text: Certainly a better product than you can buy anywhere else
customer_reviews.author: Vickie N

customer_reviews.title: Great product with the many style needle
customer_reviews.text: Great product with the many style needle. I do wish it was not plated and more of a pure stainless steel so it can be more NSF verified for commercial use. The assembly is excellent quality and had not had issue with threading the needle or the cap on to the body. Great price for the product.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. M

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't clog. Heavy duty.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is better quality than I had expected. It's heavy, and the needles are nice and big. I just used it to inject melted butter, granulated garlic, salt and pepper into a chicken and it did not clog up like others I've used in the past. I'm glad I bought this one.
customer_reviews.author: C. M.

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Worth every penny. I worked in a machine shop for 41+ years and appreciate exceptional quality of material and manufacturing and this device has it. Highly recommend as you get greatly added flavor and juiciness in meat and especially poultry.
customer_reviews.author: Dungeondog

customer_reviews.title: the whole thing is nicely finished and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: this thing is incredibly well built. virtually no leakage around the piston seal, does not drip or leak. the whole thing is nicely finished and comfortable. theres only so much you ca rave about a meat syringe, but this meets and exceeds any expectations i had for it. great product.
customer_reviews.author: j

customer_reviews.title: I would definitely recommend it. The manufacturer even followed up with an ...
customer_reviews.text: I had another injector but it leaked where the needle connects to the cylinder. This one is threaded is and a really high quality injector. I would definitely recommend it. The manufacturer even followed up with an email that had a couple of great recipes. They a great to deal with .
customer_reviews.author: Ronald J. Wichman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for turkey, chicken, and pork
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the Grill Beast injector. I have used it several times with fantastic results. The injector will hold a very large amount of liquid. I used it to inject a turkey and I only had to fill it 1 time per turkey breast. You won't regret buying this injection
customer_reviews.author: J112575

customer_reviews.title: How and why did I not get one of these until now?
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty -- smooth and efficient to use, easy to use. The single port and multiple port injection pins together are extremely useful to have. Infusing the chicken with marinade via this injector works perfectly. Chicken is tender and great tasting. Can't wait to try with a pineapple juice and brown sugar ham marinade.
customer_reviews.author: Rand M. Elison

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: Just injected a turkey for a Friendsgiving party with this injector. My wife said this has been tha best turkey I made. I was going to buy a much fancier injection system, but figured for the price I would try this one. I was not disappointed. Easy to clean. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: This is a great injector and with its stainless steel construction I can ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great injector and with its stainless steel construction I can tell it will last me forever. I like the three different injector needles and the easy to use plunger handle. I also like that it came with additional O-Rings. I definitely would recommend it for anyone that is looking for a life long injector.
customer_reviews.author: Jed D Valdez

product_meta.title: Grill BEAST - 304 Stainless Steel Meat Injector Kit with 2-oz Large Capacity Barrel and 3 Professional Marinade Needles
product_meta.description: Color:Beast InjectorWarmhoming Multipurpose Kitchen Shears with 5 Stainless Steel Blades and Cleaning Comb
feature_bullets: Made from 304 HIGH GRADE STAINLESS STEEL, Grill Beast's meat injector is perfect for intensifying the flavor of brisket, pork, chicken, turkey, lamb, goose, duck, and more! Durable and sharp, the needles puncture any meat or poultry with ease, ensuring you can enrich the taste of tough or thick cuts.

A 2-OUNCE BARREL minimizes refills, a sturdy marinade injector plunger offers improved pressure control, and a three-ring handle gives you a better grip for optimum comfort. Super quick and easy to disassemble, this premium quality meat marinade injector is also dishwasher-safe, making cleanup a piece of cake!

THREE SPECIALLY DESIGNED MARINATE INJECTION NEEDLES allows for deep penetration and even distribution so every bite contains an explosion of flavor. One 6" needle is solid with an angled cut while the other 6" needle contains 12 holes. The 12 hole needle is for liquid marinades and the wide tip needle is for chunky marinades. The third needle is 3" and is for a more precision injection and for smaller cuts of meat.

FREE BEAST INJECTOR EBOOK INCLUDED! Discover the latest tips, techniques, and advice for creating mouth-watering recipes everyone will love. Learn how to use the marinade injector like a professional and care for it effectively.
A 100% MONEY-BACK GUARANTEE and LIFETIME WARRANTY - eliminate all risk so you can use Grill Beast's marinade injector kit with confidence! Your complete satisfaction is assured.
